name: new target, inc.
description:
From offices in Washington DC and Los Angeles, New Target is a leading digital services firm delivering marketing strategies, web design, web development and data integration to national brands, international NGOs, federal agencies and non-profits.
We have highly specialized experience integrating websites, e-commerce platforms, databases, and other systems with an organization's association management, customer relationship, or constituent outreach software to create a meaningful, personal, and seamless user experience. 
New Target is comprised of experienced strategists, designers, systems architects, developers, and project management professionals, each dedicated to providing the highest quality service.
